desc: Organize your network resources by learning how to design, manage, and maintain Active Directory. Updated to cover Windows Server 2012, the fifth edition of this bestselling guide gives you a thorough grounding of Microsoftâ€™s network directory service by explaining concepts in an easy-to-understand, narrative style.

title: Active Directory: Designing, Deploying, and Running Active Directory
